title: Assessing the news about COVID-19 vaccines: A Q&A with Dr. Lynda Stuart
author: Melinda French Gates Co-chair; Board Member; Bill; Melinda Gates Foundation
description: The world is closer than ever to having safe and effective COVID-19 vaccines. Dr. Lynda Stuart shares her thoughts on the news surrounding Pfizer and Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine candidates.
